name: finger cats
notes:
cute little kittens that slip onto your fingers to play! originally designed for hospital volunteers bringing joy and comfort to children in pediatric wards, these finger cats are now available for everyone to make. crochet your own tiny kitten and bring a smile to a child anywhere in the world.

materials

• 100% pure cotton yarn, group a/ 5-ply / fingering, in your favorite
colors. i used drops safran by garnstudio (50g = 160 m)
• 4 mm safety eyes
• 1.0 mm and 2.0 mm crochet hooks
• black embroidery thread
• pins, stich marker, tapestry needle, scissors
• textile glue
• fiberfill stuffing
• wire (for shaping the tail)
